channel.title: Windows Backups :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Resources How to Back Up Windows 10 from Tech Advisor How to Use All of Windows 10â€™s Backup and Recovery Tools from HowTo Geek How to Make a Full Backup of your Windows 10 PC from Windows Central These resources mostly refer to Windows Server 2012 or 2016, but should work for 2019 as well.
